title.narrative: Accelerating Universal Access to Early and Effective Tuberculosis Care

description.narrative: To support the aims of India's National Strategic Plan for Tuberculosis Control to expand the provision and utilization of quality diagnosis and treatment services for people suffering from tuberculosis.

Ministry of Health and Family Welfare

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Institutional arrangements | Description :The Recipient, through MOHFW, shall maintain Memoranda ofUnderstanding with its states and union territories for implementation of the RNTCP, including the obligation to maintain units atthe state, district and sub-district level, for the purpose of supporting and monitoring project implementation. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement The Recipient shall, through MOHFW, prepare and furnish to the Association interim unaudited financial reportscovering the semester, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association and including a report on expenditures incurred by theEEP Participating States.

Finance Agreement: Annual work plans and budgets | Description: The Recipient, through MOHFW, shall prepare and furnish to theAssociation a consolidated annual work plan and budget containing all eligible Project activities and expenditures at the centrallevel proposed to be included in the Project for the following Recipient's fiscal year, including any other activities andexpenditures required for the efficient implementation of the RNTCP’s 2012 NSP. | Frequency: Yearly

Finance Agreement: Environmental and social safeguards | Description: The Recipient shall carry out the project in accordance, andconsistent, with the provisions of the Environmental and Bio-medical Waste Management Plan and the Social Action Plan. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Procurement qualification requirements | Description :The Recipient, through MOHFW, shall ensure that goods (inparticular anti-TB and other drugs, and medical supplies) procured under contracts awarded on the basis of InternationalCompetitiveBidding, Limited International Bidding, National Competitive Bidding and Framework Agreement meet qualificationrequirements acceptable to the Association and set forth in the Procurement Plan. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

The Recipient shall furnish reports to the Association on the status of achievement of the relevant DLI Targets, all in accordancewith the DLI Verification Protocol, including (where applicable) reports of independent verification of the relevant DLI Targets.

title.narrative: TB suspects and patients who have received drug-sensitivity testing (DST)
